report.title: UKBMS Annual Summary table Occurrence list
report.description: An occurrence list with a count attribute to be used in the UKBMS Annual Summary table, with filters for Indicia user, date start and end, location.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN locations l ON s.location_id=l.id LEFT JOIN (samples child JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=child.id AND o.deleted=false AND #website_filter# JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND (CAST(cttl.taxon_list_id AS character varying)='#taxon_list_id#' OR '#taxon_list_id#' = '') ) ON child.parent_id=s.id AND child.deleted=false #joins# WHERE s.deleted = false AND s.parent_id IS NULL #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id as sample_id, l.name as location_name, s.location_id, s.date_start as date, cttl.taxon_meaning_id, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common, s.created_by_id as user_id, (select avg(sav.int_value) from sample_attribute_values sav JOIN sample_attributes sa ON sav.sample_attribute_id = sa.id AND sa.deleted = false AND sa.caption = '% sun' JOIN samples s2 ON sav.sample_id = s2.id AND s2.parent_id = s.id AND s2.deleted = false WHERE sav.deleted = false) as sun

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: taxon_list_id
param.description: ID of the taxon list to show

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: location_list
param.description: Enter a comma separated list of location IDs
